scripts.build: npm run typecheck && npm run bundle && npm run build:css && cp index.html dist/index.html
scripts.build:ps: npm run typecheck && npm run bundle:ps && npm run build:css && copy index.html dist\index.html
scripts.start: npm run build && npx esbuild src/entries/flight-detail.tsx --bundle --format=esm --outfile=dist/flight-detail.js --servedir=dist --serve=3030 --watch
scripts.start:ps: npm run build:ps && npx esbuild src/entries/item-dashboard.tsx --bundle --format=esm --outfile=dist/item-dashboard.js --servedir=dist --serve=3030 --watch
